10X focus on Founders.

Ten X Labs is an Angel and pre-Seed fund that differentiates itself by creating deep, trusting bonds with first-time Founders before they’re even ready for investment. When that’s built, we offered continued assistance in the form of expertise and capital, helping speed up business maturity, and building minority-led, Seed-ready companies. By getting in on the ground floor with these Founders, our goal is to generate outsized returns for our investors, and change the economic landscape for our Founders.

Mbiyimoh Ghogomu
Tradeblock — The world’s largest pure-play sneaker trading platform

Ten X Labs invests our expertise and capital in first-time Founders of color. We help move businesses from Angel to Seed stage in a fraction of the time, at a fraction of the cost.
